DOC.brief_title: Identification Validation Biomarkers Acute Kidney Injury Recovery
DOC.criteria: . Males females 21 year age old Receiving care intensive care unit Expected remain ICU least 48 hour enrollment Use indwelling urinary catheter standard care time enrollment Subject must acute kidney injury ( KDIGO stage 2 stage 3 ) time first sample collection First sample must collect within 36 hour meet KDIGO stage 2 criterion Written inform consent provide patient legally authorize representative ( LAR ) Prior kidney transplantation Comfortmeasuresonly status Already receive dialysis ( either acute chronic ) imminent need dialysis time enrollment History human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) hepatitis virus ( base upon available medical record ) infection ( NOTE : HIV hepatitis test need perform enrollment study . ) Special population , pregnant woman , prisoner institutionalized individual Patient meet follow : Active bleeding anticipate need > 4 unit PRBC day Hemoglobin < 7 g/dL Any condition physician 's opinion would contraindicate draw serial blood sample clinical study purpose
